Interface CSSErrorHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HandlerBase, ThrowCssExceptionErrorHandler

    public interface CSSErrorHandler
    Interface for CSS parser error handlers.
    Author:
    Ronald Brill

      throws CSSException

        CSSException - if any.
